templates.title: Suspicious PowerShell Execution Detected
templates.description: Encoded PowerShell command executed from unusual parent process. Command attempts to download remote payload from suspicious domain.

templates.title: Spear Phishing Email with Malicious Attachment
templates.description: Employee reported suspicious email claiming to be from IT department. Contains macro-enabled Excel document with invoice theme.

templates.title: Multiple Failed Login Attempts - Brute Force Attack
templates.description: Abnormal number of failed authentication attempts detected from multiple IP addresses targeting admin accounts over 15-minute window.

templates.title: Sensitive Data Uploaded to Unauthorized Cloud Storage
templates.description: DLP policy triggered on large file transfer to personal Dropbox account. File contains customer PII and financial records.

templates.title: Ransomware Indicators Detected on File Server
templates.description: Rapid file encryption activity observed. Multiple files renamed with .locked extension. Ransom note created in shared directories.

templates.title: Credential Harvesting Attempt via Fake Login Page
templates.description: Users reported being redirected to convincing clone of company portal. Domain registered 3 days ago, hosting credential phishing site.

templates.title: Unusual Outbound Traffic to Known C2 Infrastructure
templates.description: Firewall logs show sustained connection to IP address associated with Emotet botnet. Encrypted traffic patterns consistent with C2 beaconing.

templates.title: Privilege Escalation Attempt on Database Server
templates.description: Non-privileged account attempted to execute commands requiring elevated permissions. Multiple CVE exploitation attempts logged.
